citeinfo.title: Porphyry copper deposits of the world

descript.abstract: Information on porphyry copper deposits from around the world with grade and tonnage models, a general classification based on geologic setting, mineralogy, with data allowing locations of these deposits to be plotted using GIS.
descript.purpose: Support regional to national scale mineral resource assessment

theme.themekt: Alexandria Digital Library Feature Type Thesaurus
General glossary for mineral resources spatial data
Mineral Resources Data System commodity types

procstep.procdesc: Modified location given in record 260 (El Cobre, Cuba) to the inundated pit where mining occurred in the past. Thanks to Mr. Mario J. Faz, P.G., of Miami Florida for finding and alerting us to this problem.

enttyp.enttypd: General descriptive information about the deposit

attr.attrdef: Record ID. A distinct numerical identifier for the database record without further scientific significance, assigned by the data manager of mrdata.usgs.gov. Integer values. Int of width 4.
Deposit name. The most recent deposit name. Textual values of no more than 36 characters.
Includes. The names of deposits that have been combined with the primary deposit as a result of the two-kilometer minimum separation rule. Textual values of no more than 58 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 614 records have no value for includes.

attr.attrdef: Other names. Alternative names that have been used for the deposit. Textual values of no more than 154 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 525 records have no value for altname.

attr.attrdef: Country. Name of the country where the deposit occurs. Textual values of no more than 18 characters.
Country code. Coded abbreviation combining the country and state or province. Textual values of no more than 4 characters.
State or province. State or province, if known, where the deposit occurs. Textual values of no more than 40 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 233 records have no value for stprov.

attr.attrdef: Latitude. Geographic latitude in decimal degrees, datum WGS84. South is negative, north positive. Real numbers stored in double precision.
Longitude. Geographic longitude in decimal degrees, datum WGS84. West is negative, east positive. Real numbers stored in double precision.

Age. Age of the deposit in millions of years before the present based on reported absolute (typically thermal dates) ages or midpoints of geologic time scale units. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 60 records have no value for agemy.

attr.attrdef: Deposit age. Textual values of no more than 67 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 97 records have no value for depage.

attr.attrdef: Ore tonnage. Total tons of ore based on total production, reserves, and resources at the lowest possible cutoff grade, in millions of metric tons. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 267 records have no value for oreton.

attr.attrdef: Copper grade. Average grade of copper for the deposit, as percent of metal in ore. Zero value means the grade (always for byproducts) was unavailable. Real numbers stored in double precision.
Molybdenum grade. Average grade of molybdenum for the deposit, as percent of metal in ore. Zero value means the grade (always for byproducts) was unavailable. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 1 records have no value for mogrd.

attr.attrdef: Gold grade. Average grade of gold for the deposit, as grams per metric ton of ore. Zero value means the grade (always for byproducts) was unavailable. Real numbers stored in double precision.
Silver grade. Average grade of silver for the deposit, as grams per metric ton of ore. Zero value means the grade (always for byproducts) was unavailable. Real numbers stored in double precision.

Type of deposit. Classification of the deposit using a system new to this report using the observed rocks reported in maps rather than characteristics that are frequently unobservable in yet-to-be discovered deposits. Textual values of no more than 3 characters.
Emplacement depth. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 3 records have no value for empldepth.

attr.attrdef: Other deposits between 5km and 10km. Listing of other deposits by type that are between 5 and 10 km of the subject deposit. Each deposit type is coded as the deposit-type number and deposit type as listed in USGS Bulletins 1693 (Cox and Singer, 1986) and 2004 (Bliss, 1992). Textual values of no more than 37 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 460 records have no value for dep5km10km.

attr.attrdef: Other deposits within 5km. Listing of other deposits by type that are within 5 km of the subject deposit. Each deposit type is coded as the deposit-type number and deposit type as listed in USGS Bulletins 1693 (Cox and Singer, 1986) and 2004 (Bliss, 1992). Textual values of no more than 59 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 352 records have no value for dep5km.

attr.attrdef: Deposit ID. Integer values. Int of width 8.
Latitude degrees. Degrees of latitude. Integer values. Int of width 3.
Latitude minutes. Minutes of latitude. Integer values. Int of width 2.
Latitude seconds. Seconds of latitude. Integer values. Int of width 2.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 355 records have no value for latsec.

attr.attrdef: Longitude degrees. Degrees of lontitude. Integer values. Int of width 4.
Longitude minutes. Minutes of longitude. Integer values. Int of width 2.
Longitude seconds. Seconds of longitude. Integer values. Int of width 2.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 365 records have no value for lonsec.

attr.attrdef: Rocks in deposit. Textual values of no more than 204 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 45 records have no value for rockdep.

attr.attrdef: Rocks on map. Textual values of no more than 184 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 408 records have no value for rockmap.

attr.attrdef: Rocks on map in deposit. Textual values of no more than 213 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 19 records have no value for rockmapdep.

attr.attrdef: Discovery date. Date the deposit was discovered, where this is known. Textual values of no more than 35 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 306 records have no value for discdate.

attr.attrdef: Startup date. Date mining of the deposit began, if this is know. Textual values of no more than 19 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 553 records have no value for startdate.

attr.attrdef: Ore A-axis. Length in km of the major axis of the ellipse that best fits the shape of the ore body projected in two dimensions to the surface. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 17 records have no value for ore_a.

attr.attrdef: Ore BA-axis. Length in km of the minor axis of the ellipse that best fits the shape of the ore body projected in two dimensions to the surface. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 11 records have no value for ore_b.

attr.attrdef: Ore Area. Area in sq km of the ellipse that best fits the shape of the ore body projected in two dimensions to the surface. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 11 records have no value for ore_area.

attr.attrdef: Alteration A-axis. Length in km of the major axis of the ellipse that best fits the shape of the alteration zone projected in two dimensions to the surface. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 10 records have no value for alter_a.

attr.attrdef: Alteration B-axis. Length in km of the minor axis of the ellipse that best fits the shape of the alteration zone projected in two dimensions to the surface. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 10 records have no value for alter_b.

attr.attrdef: Alteration area. Area in sq km of the ellipse that best fits the shape of the alteration zone projected in two dimensions to the surface. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 10 records have no value for alter_area.

attr.attrdef: Sulfide A-axis. Length in km of the major axis of the ellipse that best fits the shape of the sulfide occurrence zone projected in two dimensions to the surface. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 10 records have no value for sulf_a.

attr.attrdef: Sulfide B-axis. Length in km of the minor axis of the ellipse that best fits the shape of the sulfide occurrence zone projected in two dimensions to the surface. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 10 records have no value for sulf_b.

attr.attrdef: Sulfide area. Area in sq km of the ellipse that best fits the shape of the sulfide occurrence zone projected in two dimensions to the surface. Real numbers stored in double precision.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 10 records have no value for sulf_area.

attr.attrdef: Comments. Supplementary information. Textual values of no more than 255 characters.

edom.edomvd: Information not available for this record. 203 records have no value for comments.

enttyp.enttypd: Mineralogy of the deposit as reported in scientific literature

attr.attrdef: Record ID. Numerical identifier for the deposit, matches a value in main:rec_id. Integer values. Int of width 4.

Mineralogy. Name of minerals reported as present in the deposit, without regard for their abundance. Most rock-forming minerals, such as feldspar, calcite, and quartz, are not included. Some variants of rock forming minerals that may be related to mineralization or alteration, such as Ag calcite, are included. Textual values of no more than 44 characters.

enttyp.enttypd: Scientific literature consulted by the authors to characterize the deposit

attr.attrdef: Record ID. Numerical identifier for the deposit, matches a value in main:rec_id. Integer values. Int of width 4.
References. Papers and web sites that were used to describe the deposit. In a few cases unpublished sources were used. Textual values of no more than 255 characters.

distinfo.distliab: This report is preliminary and has not been reviewed for conformity with U.S. Geological Survey editorial standards (or with the North American Stratigraphic Code). Any use of trade, product, or firm names is for descriptive purposes only and does not imply endorsement by the U.S. Government.
